name: Lace's Coconut Bread
author: Lace
summary: This coconut bread is somewhat cake-like. It's quick, easy, paleo-friendly, and never fails to satisfy. Adding chocolate chips turns it into a decadent treat.
ingredients: ½ cup chocolate chips (such as Ghirardelli®)  (Optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine coconut flour, flaked coconut, lemon zest, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl
Mix in yogurt, eggs, and maple syrup to form a smooth batter
Pour batter into prepared loaf pans
Bake in preheated oven until tops spring back when lightly pressed, about 25 minutes
Cover with aluminum foil and bake for an additional 5 minutes
Cool muffins in the pans for 10 minutes before removing aluminum foil and turning out on a wire rack to cool completely
